data.title: What is the difference between mainstream and indie films?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 11): There’s actually two different terms you’re mashing together here - that aren’t necessarily the same thing.

“Mainstream” generally refers to something designed to appeal to as wide an audience as possible. It’s opposite isn’t indie, it’s “Niche”: Something designed to appeal st...
